thread.section_title: Kasamba Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kasamba | kasamba.com
thread.title: Petko

author: Petko
title: Petko
text:
It's so easy to navigate through Kasamba.com, that it almost feels like everything you'll ever need is one click away. On those very rare occasions, when I get confused, I just search for more info in their service center and that usually is enough to get the answer I'm looking for.
Also, I must say that I've never experienced better customer service in my entire life. The Customer Support Representatives @ Kasamba.com are simply amazing ! Keep it up guys !
